item.title: CVE-2023-47797|2024-08-29T14:15:06.460Z -- liferay -- portal
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability on a content pageâ€™s edit page in Liferay Portal 7.4.3.94 through 7.4.3.95 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the `p_l_back_url_title` parameter.
